name: reactree-ios-dev
description: Enterprise-grade iOS/tvOS development with SwiftUI, MVVM, Clean Architecture, 14 specialized agents, 27 comprehensive skills, automated quality gates, hooks system, and beads integration. One-command setup with /ios-init.
longDescription:
Complete multi-agent orchestration system for iOS and tvOS development featuring:

• 14 Specialized Agents - Workflow orchestration, code generation, testing, quality gates, accessibility, performance profiling
• 27 Comprehensive Skills - Swift conventions, SwiftUI patterns, MVVM architecture, networking, testing, security, accessibility, performance optimization
• Automated Init Command - /ios-init copies all agents, rules, and skills to your project in seconds
• Hooks System - Auto-discovery, validation, and workflow routing
• Quality Gates - SwiftLint strict mode, build validation, 80% test coverage enforcement
• Platform Support - Universal iOS and tvOS with platform-specific patterns
• Advanced Examples - Offline sync with Core Data, push notifications with APNs, tvOS focus navigation
• Beads Integration - Track multi-session work with automatic epic and task creation
• Memory Systems - Working memory (24h TTL) and episodic learning for faster workflows
